agros-fancy-fixes.midnightconfig.title: Agro's Fancy Fixes
agros-fancy-fixes.midnightconfig.enable_:
Whether diamond equipment should be craftable.

If disabled, diamond equipment can only be obtained through BetterEnchanting's Diamond Upgrade Smithing Template.

§lOn§r: Default.

§lOff§r: Diamond equipment can only be obtained through a Diamond Upgrade Smithing Template.

Whether certain essences should be craftable.

Essences: §lAgility, Building, Gravity, Photosynthesis, Poison Protection, Reach, Wings
agros-fancy-fixes.midnightconfig.enchant:
Allows for DnT enchanted books to be crafted into Better Enchantment's essences.

Example: Enchanted Book (Gravity) -> Essence of Gravity

§lOff§r: Disabled.

§lFixed§r: All books, regardless of level, give one Essence.

§lScaling (Static)§r: Books give Essence equal to their level.

§lScaling (Dynamic)§r: Books give one Essence for every two levels.
